short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize product titles & descriptions with ShopeeGPT to improve ranking.
short.ms: Optimumkan judul & penerangan produk dengan ShopeeGPT untuk meningkatkan ranking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**New Feature: Free Access to ChatGPT Plus, no OpenAi or ChatGPT Account needï¼**

ShopeeGPT is a free AI-powered listing optimizer that helps Shopee sellers optimize listing to improve Shopee search ranking. 
With the help of ShopeeGPT, you will never need to search for Shopee tips or templates for your listings. Just one click, you can get some better listing choices by ChatGPT OpenAI. 

ğŸš€ Features
â€’ Optimize title of Shopee listing
â€’ Optimize description of Shopee listing
â€’ Keywords finder and Keyword suggestion
â€’ Copy optimized listing content with one click
â€’ Export optimized listing content as .doc

ğŸš€ How to use
1. Optimize title
    a. Go to listing page of the product
    b. Open the ShopeeGPT and select Title Generator
    c. Search and pick keywords
    d. Click Generate Title button and get suggestion.
2. Optimize description
    a. Go to listing page of the product
    b. Open the ShopeeGPT and select Description Generator
    c. Search and select keywords, and set parameters.
    d. Click Generate Description and get suggestion.

ğŸš€ How it works
ShopeeGPT analyzes current product information such as title, description, keywords and uses ChatGPT to provide you with optimized listing content.

ShopeeGPT is a free AI-powered listing optimizer that helps Shopee sellers optimize listing to improve Shopee search ranking. 
With the help of ShopeeGPT, you will never need to search for Shopee tips or templates for your listings. Just one click, you can get some better listing choices by ChatGPT OpenAI. 

ğŸš€ Features
â€’ Optimize title of Shopee listing
â€’ Optimize description of Shopee listing
â€’ Keywords finder and Keyword suggestion
â€’ Copy optimized listing content with one click
â€’ Export optimized listing content as .doc

ğŸš€ How to use
1. Optimize title
    a. Go to listing page of the product
    b. Open the ShopeeGPT and select Title Generator
    c. Search and pick keywords
    d. Click Generate Title button and get suggestion.
2. Optimize description
    a. Go to listing page of the product
    b. Open the ShopeeGPT and select Description Generator
    c. Search and select keywords, and set parameters.
    d. Click Generate Description and get suggestion.

ğŸš€ How it works
ShopeeGPT analyzes current product information such as title, description, keywords and uses ChatGPT to provide you with optimized listing content.

long.ms:
ShopeeGPT is a free AI-powered listing optimizer that helps Shopee sellers optimize listing to improve Shopee search ranking. 
With the help of ShopeeGPT, you will never need to search for Shopee tips or templates for your listings. Just one click, you can get some better listing choices by ChatGPT OpenAI. 

ğŸš€ Features
â€’ Optimize title of Shopee listing
â€’ Optimize description of Shopee listing
â€’ Keywords finder and Keyword suggestion
â€’ Copy optimized listing content with one click
â€’ Export optimized listing content as .doc

ğŸš€ How to use
1. Optimize title
    a. Go to listing page of the product
    b. Open the ShopeeGPT and select Title Generator
    c. Search and pick keywords
    d. Click Generate Title button and get suggestion.
2. Optimize description
    a. Go to listing page of the product
    b. Open the ShopeeGPT and select Description Generator
    c. Search and select keywords, and set parameters.
    d. Click Generate Description and get suggestion.

ğŸš€ How it works
ShopeeGPT analyzes current product information such as title, description, keywords and uses ChatGPT to provide you with optimized listing content.
